content: द्यु {c2c} <ab>P.</ab> (द्यौति) To advance towards, encounter, attack, assail; <ls>Bk. 6. 118</ls>, <ls n="Bk.">14. 101.</ls>

द्यु {%<ab>n.</ab>%} {@--1@} A day. {@--2@} The sky. {@--3@} Brightness. {@--4@} Heaven. {@--5@} Sharpness; <ab>cf.</ab> अद्यु. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} Fire. (द्यु is a substitute for दिव् {%<ab>f.</ab>%} before terminations beginning with consonants and in compounds).
